weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from the clouds
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall
🌧️ Plants like me

weather.question: I am big and bright and warm. I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I'm yellow and round.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I am out.
🔥 I can make you feel hot.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny crystals.
🧤 You can make a snowman with me.
🏔️ I am common in cold places.

weather.question: I move the leaves and the trees. Sometimes I am gentle, sometimes strong. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.
🍃 I make things fly.
🌬️ I can be soft or loud.

weather.question: I am gray and cover the sun. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I float in the sky.
🌧️ I can make it rain
🌫️ I can block the sun.

weather.question: After the rain, you might see me with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ The sun helps me to appear.
✨ I am an arch in the sky

weather.question: I am very hot and bright. I am like a big fire in the sky, but I don't burn the world. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a star, but much closer than the others.
🌍 I give the Earth light and heat.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am cold and icy, and sometimes fall from the sky like frozen rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am smaller than snow, but bigger than rain.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I fall on you.
🥶 I am frozen water.

weather.question: I am made of water, but I'm not rain. You can't see very far when I'm around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud near the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I am around.
👻 I am often seen in spooky stories.

weather.question: I'm a big storm that spins around. I have strong winds and lots of rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I'm a very powerful storm.
🏠 I can damage buildings.
🌊 I often start over the ocean.

bug.question: I can fly and like flowers. I make yummy food for bears. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like sweet things from colorful plants.
🐝 I make something golden and sticky.
🐻 Bears love to eat my food!

bug.question: I hop around and am green. You can find me in a grassy field! What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 My color is like the grass.
🦵 I use my legs to jump very high.
🌱 I like to eat plants.

bug.question: I have lots of legs and like to march in a line. I carry things. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small but very strong.
🤝 We work together in a group.
🧺 I can carry food that is bigger than me!

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly around pretty flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
💐 I like to drink nectar.
🌈 My wings have many colors.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and people think I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My name has a 'lady' in it.
⚫ I have dots on my back.
🍎 I am often red.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 Flies get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I dig in the ground and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I am long and wiggly.
🌱 I help make the soil healthy.
🐦 Birds love to eat me.

bug.question: I light up at night and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I glow in the dark.
🌃 You can see me when it is dark.
💡 I use my light to find friends.

bug.question: I chew on plants and sometimes people don't like me. I turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I am a small worm.
🍃 I eat leaves all day long.
🦋 I change into something beautiful.

bug.question: I sing very loudly in the summer. People compare me to an instrument. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I love warm weather.
🎶 My singing is very loud.
🌳 I live in trees.
